keywords.indexterm: TEI P4 Document TypeAuthor extensionstransformation scenarios

body.p: The following default transformations are available:

ul.li: TEI HTML - Transforms a TEI document into a HTML document;
TEI P4 -> TEI P5 Conversion - Convert a TEI P4 document into a TEI P5 document;
TEI PDF - Transforms a TEI document into a PDF document using the Apache FOP engine.
